archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Identify New Product Offering Development Costs and Anticipated Benefits
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Identify the development costs and anticipated benefits. This includes forecasted demand, revenue gains, productivity gains, performance improvements, and/or operational cost improvements.

properties.value: Identify New Product Offering Development Costs and Anticipated Benefits identifies the development costs and anticipated benefits. This includes forecasted demand, revenue gains, productivity gains, performance improvements, and/or operational cost improvements. It also defines the proposed attributes specific to the product offering based on those for the associated product specification and used for advertising and sales.
